code: import{SHOW_ALERT,HIDE_ALERT}from'../types';export function showAlert(alert){return function(dispatch){dispatch(showAnAlert(alert));};}export function hideAlert(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(hideAnAlert());};}var showAnAlert=function showAnAlert(alert){return{type:SHOW_ALERT,payload:alert};};var hideAnAlert=function hideAnAlert(){return{type:HIDE_ALERT};};
